name: LandslideLyndon
description: With the smart contract deployed [here](https://etherscan.io/address/0xf924fed62a15c879213e677dada6cf7db5174620#code) as a baseline, this document describes a number of modifications, implemented by the smart contract in [this](https://github.com/smatthewenglish/LandslideLyndon) GitHub repository.
